ConsistencyLevel.description: Represents the manner and timing in which the successful write or update of an object is reflected in a subsequent read operation of that same object.

DirectoryArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that is associated with the Directory where the object resides. For more information, see arns.

FacetFilter.description: Used to filter the list of object attributes that are associated with a certain facet.

MaxResults.description: The maximum number of items to be retrieved in a single call. This is an approximate number.

ObjectReference.description: The reference that identifies the object whose attributes will be listed.
